note:
'91 Pansexual Non-Binary-ish cat-person.
Casual gamer, Linux user, M365 & Azure admin.
F(L)OSS enthusiast, avoids ML/"AI" nonsense.
Tries to be accessible, only boosts pics with good alt text.

Avatar is a stylized lightbulb shaped like a cat's head glowing in yellow, with black nose, whiskers and pupils, with two fangs barely poking out of the muzzle. The "screw" (shaped like a black cyliner on top of a purple hemisphere) is decorated with a red collar, off which hands a golden spherical bell.
